TopicTitle: So NASA posted sounds from space and spacecraft...

Articles.Content:
Decided to use Cassini's transmissions as the base for this one. Let me know what you think!

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/cassini-adrift
Thats going in my playlist that's what I think. Beautiful job.
Thank Moto! Glad someone liked it, lol
Now that sounds good. Someone should use this in a cinematic.

Thanks Vaporo! If anyone wants to use it let me know! It's based off of NASA's sounds of Cassini so it's free for anyone to use...I think I have it set to freely download, just mention Jatwaa and NASA and we are golden
